title: I am level 30 yet cannot post to "Team Recruitment"
body: I was curious to know if this was a bug, but I am level 30 yet it's asking for me to be level 6 or higher; could this be a flaw?

replies.body: Nope, not a bug. It's just that you probably hadn't used the boards for a while, so your profiles needed to sync. You're showing as level 30 now, so you should be clear to post!
